00042     public function init()
00043     {
00044         parent::init();
00045         
00046         //  Add our options
00047         $this->addOptions( self::getBaseOptions() );
00048 
00049         //  Set base values
00050         $this->templatePath = Yii::getPathOfAlias( 'pogostick.templates.crud' );
00051         
00052         $this->controllerBaseClass = 'CPSController';
00053         $this->controllerTemplateName = 'controller.php';
00054 
00055         $this->name = 'pscontroller';

00063     public function run( $arArgs )
00064     {
00065         //  Process arguments...
00066         $arArgs = $this->processArguments( $arArgs );
00067         
00068         //  Check args...
00069         if ( ! ( $_sControllerId = array_shift( $arArgs ) ) )
00070         {
00071             echo "\033[1mError\033[0m: controller name is required.\n";
00072             echo $this->getHelp();
00073             return;
00074         }
00075         
00076         //  Get actions from arguments...
00077         $_arActions = array( 'index' );
00078 
00079         //  The rest of the arguments are actions...        
00080         while ( $_sAction = array_shift( $arArgs ) )
00081             array_push( $_arActions, $_sAction );
00082 
00083         //  Set our actions...
00084         $this->actions = $_arActions;
00085         
00086         //  Load the module
00087         $_oModule = Yii::app();
00088         $_sModuleId = ( $_oModule instanceof CWebModule ) ? $_oModule->id . '/' : '';
00089 
00090         //  Get controller stuff
00091         list( $_sControllerClass, $_sControllerFile, $_sControllerId ) = $this->parseControllerId( $_sControllerId, $_oModule );
00092         
00093         //  Build our parameter array
00094         $_sClasses = $this->boldEchoString( '(' . $_sControllerFile . ')', $_sControllerClass, true );
00095 
00096         $_arList = array(
00097             basename( $_sControllerFile ) => array(
00098                 'source' => $this->templatePath . DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR . $this->controllerTemplateName,
00099                 'target' => $_sControllerFile,
00100                 'callback' => array( $this, 'generateController' ),
00101                 'params' => array( $_sControllerClass, $this->actions ),
00102             ),
00103         );
00104 
00105         $_sViewPath = $_oModule->viewPath . DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR . str_replace( '/', DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR, $_sControllerId );
00106         
00107         //  Actions
00108         foreach ( $this->actions as $_sAction )
00109         {
00110             $_arList[ $_sAction . '.php' ] = array(
00111                 'source' => $this->templatePath . DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR . $this->viewTemplateName, 
00112                 'target' => $_sViewPath . DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR . $_sAction . '.php',
00113                 'callback' => array( $this, 'generateAction' ),
00114                 'params' => array(),
00115             );
00116             
00117             $_sClasses .= $this->boldEchoString( '(' . $_sViewPath . DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR . $_sAction . '.php' . ')', $_sAction, true );
00118         }
00119 
00120         $this->displayParameters( 'Controller Generator', array( 'Output Path' => $_sViewPath ) );
00121         
00122         $_sPrompt = "Do you want to generate the above classes? [\033[1mY\033[0mes|\033[1mN\033[0mo] ";
00123         
00124         //  Generate
00125         $_arList = $this->copyFiles( $_arList );
00126         
00127         //  Display results...
00128         echo $this->getResultDisplay( $_arList );
00129     }

00138     public function generateController( $sSourceFile, $arParams )
00139     {
00140         if ( ! is_file( $sSourceFile ) ) $sSourceFile = YII_PATH . '/cli/views/shell/controller/' . basename( $sSourceFile );
00141         
00142         return $this->renderFile( 
00143             $sSourceFile, 
00144             array( 
00145                 'className' => $arParams[ 0 ], 
00146                 'actions' => $arParams[ 1 ], 
00147                 'baseClass' => $this->controllerBaseClass 
00148             ), 
00149             true
00150         );
00151     }
00152 
00160     public function generateAction( $sSourceFile, $arParams )
00161     {
00162         if ( ! is_file( $sSourceFile ) ) $sSourceFile = YII_PATH . '/cli/views/shell/controller/' . basename( $sSourceFile );
00163         return $this->renderFile( $sSourceFile, array(), true );
00164     }

00172     public function generateInputField( $sModelClass, $oColumn )
00173     {
00174         if ( $oColumn->type === 'boolean' ) return "PS::field( PS::CHECK, \$model, '{$oColumn->name}' )";
00175         
00176         if ( false !== stripos( $oColumn->dbType, 'text' ) )
00177             return "PS::field( PS::TEXTAREA, \$model, '{$oColumn->name}', array( 'rows' => 6, 'cols' => 50 ) )";
00178             
00179         $_sType = ( preg_match( '/^(password|pass|passwd|passcode)$/i', $oColumn->name ) ) ? 'PS::PASSWORD' : 'PS::TEXT';
00180 
00181         if ( $oColumn->type !== 'string' || $oColumn->size === null )
00182             return "PS::field( {$_sType}, \$model, '{$_oColumn->name}' )";
00183 
00184         if ( ( $_iSize = $_iMaxLength = $oColumn->size ) > 60 ) $_iSize = 60;
00185 
00186         return "PS::field( {$_sType}, $model, '{$oColumn->name}', array( 'size' => $_iSize, 'maxlength' => $_iMaxLength ) )";
00187     }

00193     public function getHelp()
00194     {
00195         $_sName = $this->bold( $this->name );
00196         
00197         $_sOptions = $this->getDisplayOptions();
00198         
00199         return <<<EOD
00200 USAGE
00201     \033[1m{$_sName}\033[0m <\033[1mcontroller-ID\033[0m> [\033[1maction-ID\033[0m]... [options]
00202 
00203 DESCRIPTION
00204   This command generates a controller and views associated with
00205   the specified actions.
00206 
00207 PARAMETERS
00208  * controller-ID: required, controller ID, e.g., 'post'.
00209    If the controller should be located under a subdirectory,
00210    please specify the controller ID as 'path/to/ControllerID',
00211    e.g., 'admin/user'.
00212 
00213    If the controller belongs to a module, please specify
00214    the controller ID as 'ModuleID/ControllerID' or
00215    'ModuleID/path/to/Controller' (assuming the controller is
00216    under a subdirectory of that module).
00217 
00218  * action-ID: optional, action ID. You may supply one or several
00219    action IDs. A default 'index' action will always be generated.
00220 
00221 OPTIONS
00222 
00223   -f, --force                  if the files exists, you will be able to 
00224                                    optionally overwrite them.
00225                                    
00226   -d, --database               The database component to use. 
00227                                    Defaults to 'db'
00228 
00229   -b, --base-class             The base class to use for generated controllers. 
00230                                    Defaults to 'CPSController'
00231                                    
00232   -t, --template-path          The template path to use.
00233   
00234   -n, --template-name          The name of the template to use. 
00235                                    Defaults to 'controller.php'
00236 
00237 {$_sOptions}
00238 EXAMPLES
00239  * Generates the 'post' controller:
00240         {$_sName} post
00241 
00242  * Generates the 'post' controller with additional actions 'contact'
00243    and 'about':
00244         {$_sName} post contact about
00245 
00246  * Generates the 'post' controller which should be located under
00247    the 'admin' subdirectory of the base controller path:
00248         {$_sName} admin/post
00249 
00250  * Generates the 'post' controller which should belong to
00251    the 'admin' module:
00252         {$_sName} admin/post
00253 
00254 NOTE: in the last two examples, the commands are the same, but
00255 the generated controller file is located under different directories.
00256 Yii is able to detect whether 'admin' refers to a module or a subdirectory.
00257 
00258 EOD;
00259     }

00265     protected function parseControllerId( $sModelClass, $sControllerId, $oModule )
00266     {
00267         if ( empty( $sControllerId ) )
00268         {
00269             $sControllerId = $sModelClass;
00270             $_sControllerClass = ucfirst( $sControllerId ) . 'Controller';
00271             $_sControllerFile = $oModule->controllerPath . DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR . $_sControllerClass . '.php';
00272             $sControllerId[ 0 ] = strtolower( $sControllerId[ 0 ] );
00273         }
00274         else
00275         {
00276             //  Build the controller
00277             if ( false === ( $_iPos = strrpos( $sControllerId, '/' ) ) )
00278             {
00279                 $_sControllerClass = ucfirst( $sControllerId ) . 'Controller';
00280                 $_sControllerFile = $oModule->controllerPath . DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR . $_sControllerClass . '.php';
00281                 $sControllerId[ 0 ] = strtolower( $sControllerId[ 0 ] );
00282             }
00283             else
00284             {
00285                 $_sLast = substr( $sControllerId, $_iPos + 1 );
00286                 $_sLast[ 0 ] = strtolower( $_sLast );
00287                 $_iPos2 = strpos( $sControllerId, '/' );
00288                 $_sFirst = substr( $sControllerId, 0, $_iPos2 );
00289                 $_sMiddle = $_iPos === $_iPos2 ? '' : substr( $sControllerId, $_iPos2 + 1, $_iPos - $_iPos2 );
00290 
00291                 $_sControllerClass = ucfirst( $_sLast ) . 'Controller';
00292                 $_sControllerFile = ( $_sMiddle === '' ? '' : $_sMiddle . '/' ) . $_sControllerClass . '.php';
00293                 $sControllerId = empty( $_sMiddle ) ? $_sLast : $_sMiddle . '/' . $_sLast;
00294                 
00295                 if ( null !== ( $_oNewModule = Yii::app()->getModule( $_sFirst ) ) )
00296                     $oModule = $_oNewModule;
00297                 else
00298                 {
00299                     $_sControllerFile = $_sFirst . '/' . $_sControllerFile;
00300                     $sControllerId = $_sFirst . '/' . $sControllerId;
00301                 }
00302 
00303                 $_sControllerFile = $oModule->controllerPath . DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR . str_replace( '/', DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR, $_sControllerFile );
00304             }
00305         }
00306         
00307         return array( $_sControllerClass, $_sControllerFile, $sControllerId );
00308     }

00315     private function getBaseOptions()
00316     {
00317         return(
00318             array(
00319                 'viewTemplateName' => 'string:view.php',
00320                 'controllerBaseClass' => 'string:CPSController',
00321                 'controllerTemplateName' => 'string:controller.php',
00322             )
00323         );
00324     }
